sys_metadata_link.payload:
c1a6afeb2f235850e0f497eef699b628 30 Once per session as an action, the character may spend two Destiny Points and make a hard (3 difficulty dice) perception check.  If successful, for the next two rounds the character may spend one maneuver to add one automatic triumph to his next combat check made in that turn.  In addition, for the next two rounds, when the character inflicts a critical injury on a rival NPC, the target is immediately incapacitated in the same way as a minion NPC would be.

]]> Unexpected Demise SIG0001001 ben.fisher 2022-03-06 22:50:47 c282a2462f8a4d10e0f497eef699b616 2 ben.fisher 2022-03-07 22:18:05 {"ataru striker":"d78d4bb72f5ce090e0f497eef699b654,875d8fb72f5ce090e0f497eef699b68d","hermit":"7b97c2902f89b810e0f497eef699b661,4e87ced42f49b810e0f497eef699b6da","hunter":"f05f873b2f5ce090e0f497eef699b600,089f4b3b2f5ce090e0f497eef699b67d","pathfinder":"6642dffb2f5ce090e0f497eef699b69f,6d52933f2f5ce090e0f497eef699b6d0"}
